Package com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CurationsFeedCallback
    Callback used to handle successful and unsuccessful Curations feed requests
    CurationsPostCallback
    Callback for posting curations content
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BVCurations
    Bazaarvoice Curations API wrapper.
    CurationsAnalyticsManager
    Wrapper around AnalyticsManager for forming and sending Curations specific Analytics events
    CurationsAuthor
    Author of a CurationsFeedItem
    CurationsAuthor.Builder  
    CurationsCoordinate
    Coordinates that a CurationsFeedItem was posted at
    CurationsFeedItem
    Social media item referencing a Bazaarvoice Product Id with metadata including photos, video, links to the original source of the media, etc.
    CurationsFeedRequest
    Request for a list of CurationsFeedItems
    CurationsFeedRequest.Builder  
    CurationsFeedResponse
    Response for a list of CurationsFeedItems
    CurationsLink
    Link to source of social media content
    CurationsMedia
    Option to request media urls to point to the media with the provided width and height
    CurationsPhoto
    Container for the different metadata around where an image is hosted.
    CurationsPostRequest
    Used to build up request parameters when submitting photo(s) to Curations.
    CurationsPostRequest.Builder  
    CurationsPostResponse
    Response for posting curations content
    CurationsProduct
    A Bazaarvoice Product from the Curations API
    CurationsUpdateContainer
    POJO to parse response
    CurationsVideo
    Container for the different metadata around where a video is hosted.
